attributes.action: Stop UK funds going to Eurovision which is no longer about talent but politics
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Recent years it has become apparent that the money the UK donates to Eurovision is a waste, it is no longer about talent but politics and since when has Israel and Russia been in Europe. This money could be spent on better things which are needed within the UK

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
